objects.text:
✿ Unique artistic frame with floral mosaic design
✿ Premium mirrored blue lenses with UV protection
✿ Perfect for festivals and summer occasions

product_details.name: Bohemian Bloom Sunglasses - Vibrant Floral Mosaic Designer Eyewear
product_details.description:
• ✿ Unique artistic frame featuring hand-crafted floral mosaic design
• ✿ Premium mirrored blue lenses with 100% UV protection
• ✿ Colorful 3D flower embellishments in yellow, pink, and mixed tones
• ✿ Multi-colored mosaic pattern frame for a one-of-a-kind look
• ✿ Statement fashion piece perfect for festivals and summer occasions
• ✿ Durable construction with high-quality materials
• ✿ Eye-catching retro-inspired round frame shape
• ✿ Comfortable fit with artistic temple design
• ✿ Limited edition designer eyewear piece
• ✿ Comes with protective case and cleaning cloth

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner showcases a split background with a dual gradient style—an energetic pink-orange blend on the left and a warm yellow-orange blend on the right. The design features multiple layered text elements with distinct visual hierarchy. The top left section uses the `tagline` text layer in a bold red-pink tone to announce a sales message. The center highlights the `heading` and `subheading` layers in bold, playful fonts to introduce the themed product. Below these, the `description` text layer provides key product features in a clean sans-serif style.

The bottom area introduces a punchy rectangular button (`cta_background` and `cta`) reading an action phrase, placed near a soft grey circle with the `price` tag inside, both contrasting well for clarity. On the right, a sharp and colorful 3D product visual (`product_image`) of floral mosaic sunglasses balances the textual elements with eye-catching detail.

Decorative semi-transparent circles and abstract vector shapes in the background add playful rhythm and depth, making the layout dynamic and appealing for a summer or festival eyewear promotion.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Yellow-Orange Gradient: `#FF9933` → `#FFCC66`
- Pink Gradient Overlay: `#FFCC66` → `#FF6699`
- Accent Red-Pink: `#FF3366`
- Text Gray: `#333333`
- Button White: `#FFFFFF`
- Price Bubble Gray: `#BFBFBF` (approx)
product_color: The product image showcases vibrant, playful sunglasses with a multi-colored mosaic frame and floral reflective lenses. The dominant colors include bright orange (#FF6F3C), sunflower yellow (#FFD93D), bubblegum pink (#F98CA0), sky blue (#4AB7FF), and deep navy (#002147). These hues are cleverly blended through swirling, confetti-like patterns while still standing out through strong saturation and distinct color boundaries. The floral design within the lenses uses contrasting warm and cool tones to accentuate depth and dimension. For an advertisement banner, a lively palette of #FF6F3C, #FFD93D, #F98CA0, #4AB7FF, and #002147 would capture the whimsical and artistic essence of the product.
